item.description: All members of MLUSA are welcome to join the Boston Mychological Club at Prugatory Chasm at 198 Purgatory Rd in Sutton Ma. on Sunday August 26th at 10:30 am. We have had previous walks there and it is a very cool place with interesting paths and rock formations. If you need directions, google purgatory chasm state reservation and you can read all about the park and get directions. There are restrooms and a visitor center. Their telephone # is 508-234-3733. Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Parking lot across the street from the nature center
item.name: BMC Walk at Purgatory Chasm State Reservation in Sutton, Ma.
